**The version of ESLint you are using.**
master

**The problem you want to solve.**
`eslint-plugin-node` can be used in all eslint repos, but not included in `eslint-config-eslint`.

**Your take on the correct solution to problem.**
add `eslint-plugin-node`, so it can be easily used in repos like espree.
I'd like to enable all `eslint-plugin-node/recommended`, or some more rules?
